Port Fairy Consolidated School's New Obstacle Course

Location: Port Fairy, Australia
Date: 11/11/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Rosehill TPV® is an ideal choice for fitness areas, parkour parks, and ninja-style obstacle courses! Recently selected for the obstacle course at Port Fairy Consolidated School, Rosehill TPV® provides excellent impact absorption to help protect against accidents.With a tactile surface and outstanding UV resistance, it retains vibrant colours and softness even after years of exposure. Non-toxic and allergen-free, it’s a safe solution for both users and the environment, meeting international safety standards.Choose Rosehill TPV® for a durable, vibrant, and safe surface that inspires adventure!Thanks to &amp;
